name: Address

methods.name: getCity
methods.description: Returns the city field of this address.

methods.name: getCountry
methods.description: Returns the text-only country name component of this address.

methods.name: getCountryCode
methods.description: Returns the country code of this address if state and country picklists are enabled in your organization. Otherwise, returns null.

methods.name: getDistance
methods.signature: public Double getDistance(Location toLocation, String unit)
methods.description: Returns the distance from this location to the specified location using the specified unit.

params.name: unit
params.description: The Location to which you want to calculate the distance from the current Location. The distance unit you want to use: mi or km.

methods.name: getGeocodeAccuracy
methods.description: When using geolocation data for a given address, this method gives you relative location information based on latitude and longitude values. For example, you can find out if the latitude and longitude values point to the middle of the street, instead of the exact address.

methods.name: getLatitude
methods.description: Returns the latitude field of this address.

methods.name: getLongitude
methods.description: Returns the longitude field of this address.

methods.name: getPostalCode
methods.description: Returns the postal code of this address.

methods.name: getState
methods.description: Returns the text-only state name component of this address.

methods.name: getStateCode
methods.description: Returns the state code of this address if state and country picklists are enabled in your organization. Otherwise, returns null.

methods.name: getStreet
methods.description: Returns the street field of this address.

description: Contains methods for accessing the component fields of address compound fields.
